       --- DRAFT ---                      Tobacco Working Groups
                                       (Meetings will be convened by DPC)

       1. FDA reguIation of product, access, advertising and labeling

              White House:             DPC
              Agencies:                HHS, DOl, (Treasury?)

       2. Public education (including grass roots programs)

              White House:             DPC
              Agencies:                HHS

       3. Environmental tobacco smoke

              White House:             DPC
              Agencies:                DOL, HHS, EPA, GSA

       4. Smoking cessation and research

              White House:             DPC
              Agencies:                HHS, DOL

       5. Industry analysis (incentives, performance, farmers)

              White House:             DPC, NEC, CEA
              Agencies:                Treasury, USDA, HHS, DOL

       6.   Liability, litigation, disclosure

              White House:             DPC
              Agencies:                DO], HHS, Treasury

       7. International

              White House:             DPC, NEC
              Agencies:                HHS, USTR, Treasury, USDA

       8. Budget / children's health

              White House:             DPC, NEC, OMB
              Agencies:                HHS, Treasury, Labor, USDA

       9. Codification / Implementation
                                                                        Automated Records Management System
                                                                        Hex-Dump Conversion
